attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please REMOVE VAT or the very least reduce VAT from pets treatment and drugs. This surely cannot be seen as a luxury, medication is a necessity. A recent bill for £397.06 and £59.14 was VAT @17.5%. This cannot be right. Fuel bills have VAT of 5%, this would be a fairer alternative or even better void VAT completely.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a call to action, not your name. '...petition the Prime Minister to Valerie Gilbert' does not make any sense.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
